title: Did Georgia Pass a Law Imposing Severe Criminal Penalties for Abortions and Miscarriages?
subtitle: House Bill 481, signed into law in May 2019, prompted a wave of assertions about its possible effects.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Georgia's House Bill 481 would, when implemented, leave women open to prosecution for criminal abortion, murder, or second-degree murder for having abortions or miscarriages.
